message: Let's be fair, 60% for me, 40% for you.
I think a 55/45 split is a more fair reflection of our relative bargaining positions. Let's agree to this and move on.
Meet me in the middle, 57% for me, 43% for you.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but 53/47 is the best I can do. We need to reach an agreement before the inflation eats away at our gains any further.
Come on, 56% for me is a good deal considering the inflation is hurting me, not you.
